thread.title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Sept 22
thread.title_full: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Sept 22 | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Sept 22
text:
Sept 10 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top economic events
Government debt auctions
Political and general news events
Index of all diaries
Guide to economic indicators
** This Diary is filed daily *** THURSDAY, SEPTEMBER 10 CEBU, Philippines - Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Finance and Central Bank Deputies' Meeting. CEBU, Philippines - Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) Finance Ministerial Meeting (to Sept. 11). BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia holds executive board meeting to decide on interest rate - 1000 GMT. LIMA - Central bank of Peru interest rate decision - 2300 GMT. FRIDAY, SEPTEMBER 11 MONROVIA - International Monetary Fund chief Christine Lagarde visits Liberia. HARARE - International Monetary Fund will hold a joint press conference with Zimbabwe Finance Minister Patrick Chinamasa after reviewing the country's financial performance. SEOUL - Bank of Korea holds monetary policy committee meeting - 0100 GMT. MOSCOW - Central bank of Russia interest rate decision - 1100 GMT. MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 14 ACCRA - Bank of Ghana interest rate decision - 1100 GMT. TUESDAY, SEPTEMBER 15 BEIRUT - Beirut hosts an Iraqi banking forum (to Sept. 16) at the Phoenicia Hotel attended by the central bank governors of both countries. SANTIAGO - Central bank of Chile interest rate decision - 2100 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds monetary policy council meeting (interest rate announcement not expected). WEDNESDAY, SEPTEMBER 16 PARIS - Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) updates key macroeconomic forecasts for major economies - 0900 GMT. BANGKOK - Bank of Thailand holds monetary policy committee meeting - 0730 GMT. KAMPALA - Uganda to host the International Gas and Oil conference (to Sept. 17). Uganda President Yoweri Museveni and Finance Minister Matia Kasaija are the key speakers. THURSDAY, SEPTEMBER 17 CAIRO - Central Bank of Egypt holds monetary policy committee meeting. MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 21 ABUJA - Central Bank of Nigeria holds monetary policy meeting (to Sept. 22). MEXICO CITY - Central Bank of Mexico publishes monetary policy statement - 1800 GMT.
TUESDAY, SEPTEMBER 22 BUDAPEST - Central bank of Hungary holds rate-setting meeting. NAIROBI - Central bank of Kenya announces rate decision. ABUJA - Central bank of Nigeria announces rate decision - 1330 GMT.
